org.ligoj.app.iam.dao

Interface DelegateOrgRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<DelegateOrg,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<DelegateOrg,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<DelegateOrg,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<DelegateOrg>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<DelegateOrg,java.lang.Integer>, org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<DelegateOrg,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface DelegateOrgRepository
extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<DelegateOrg,java.lang.Integer>
    DelegateOrg repository.

        "d" : Current DN
        Visible delegates (may not be assigned) for a given user. A assigned delegates and delegates within the scope of the assigned one are visible.

    • Method Detail

      • findAllByUser

        @Query(value="FROM DelegateOrg WHERE ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))")
java.util.List<DelegateOrg> findAllByUser(java.lang.String user)
        Return all delegates attached to the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - The target user name, receiving the delegation.
        Returns:
        The DelegateOrg of a given user.

      • isAdmin

        @Query(value="SELECT COUNT(d)>0 FROM DelegateOrg d WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR canAdmin=true) AND (((type=:type OR type=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.DelegateType.TREE) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))) AND (:dn LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',dn) OR dn=:dn))")
boolean isAdmin(java.lang.String user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String dn,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               DelegateType type)
        Return true when there is at least one DelegateOrg granting the administration right for given user to modify something within the given DN.
        Parameters:
        user - The user name requesting the operation.
        dn - The DN user wants to create.
        type - The involved DelegateType.
        Returns:
        A positive number if the given DN can be created by the given user.

      • findAll

        @Query(value="SELECT d FROM DelegateOrg d WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR (((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description)))))))                                        OR EXISTS (SELECT dz.id FROM DelegateOrg dz WHERE ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))\t   AND (dz.type=d.type OR dz.type=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.DelegateType.TREE)                         \t   AND (dz.canAdmin=true AND (d.dn LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',dz.dn) OR dz.dn=d.dn))))                          AND (:type IS NULL OR d.type = :type)                                                                \tAND (:criteria = \'\'                                                                                 OR   UPPER(d.receiver) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))                                  OR   UPPER(d.name)     LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))  OR   (d.type=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.DelegateType.TREE   AND UPPER(d.dn)       LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT(\'%\',:criteria),\'%\'))))")

                                     org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
        Return all DelegateOrg objects regarding the given criteria.
        Parameters:
        user - The target user name, receiving the delegation.
        criteria - Optional, use to filter by reveiver's name of delegate's name.
        type - Optional DelegateType to match.
        page - The pagination.
        Returns:
        All DelegateOrg objects with the given name. Insensitive case search is used.

      • findByMatchingDnForWrite

        @Query(value="SELECT id FROM DelegateOrg WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR canWrite=true) AND (((type=:type OR type=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.DelegateType.TREE) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))) AND (:dn LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',dn) OR dn=:dn))")
java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> findByMatchingDnForWrite(java.lang.String user,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String dn,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                DelegateType type)
        Return delegate identifiers matching to the given DN
        Parameters:
        user - The target user name, receiving the delegation.
        dn - the DN to write.
        type - the DN type.
        Returns:
        delegate identifiers matching to the given DN

      • findByMatchingDnForAdmin

        @Query(value="SELECT id FROM DelegateOrg WHERE ((EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemRoleAssignment ra INNER JOIN ra.role r WHERE ra.user.id = :user     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SystemAuthorization a WHERE a.role = r AND a.pattern = \'.*\'          AND a.type = org.ligoj.bootstrap.model.system.SystemAuthorization$AuthorizationType.API))) OR canAdmin=true) AND (((type=:type OR type=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.DelegateType.TREE) AND ((receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.USER    AND receiver=:user)  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.GROUP   AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheGroup cg   WHERE receiver = cg.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheMembership cm INNER JOIN cm.group g WHERE cm.user.id = :user          AND (g.description = cg.description OR g.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cg.description)))))  OR (receiverType=org.ligoj.app.iam.model.ReceiverType.COMPANY AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheCompany cc WHERE receiver = cc.id     AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM CacheUser cu INNER JOIN cu.company c   WHERE cu.id = :user          AND (c.description = cc.description OR c.description LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',cc.description))))))) AND (:dn LIKE CONCAT(\'%,\',dn) OR dn=:dn))")
